name: Sausage Balls with Spinach
author: ezmars
summary: I couldn't find a sausage and spinach ball, so I came up with this recipe. My kids love them!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place a large baking stone in the oven to preheat
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until slightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes
Remove from heat and let cool enough to handle, about 10 minutes
Mix sausage, spinach, Cheddar cheese, flour, egg, salt, and nutmeg together in a large bowl until well combined
Form mixture into balls and place on the preheated baking stone
Bake in the preheated oven until browned, 20 to 25 minutes
